                                                                                                                                                                                                umc 2014 corporate social responsibility report   1
                                                    from the ceo

                                                     dear friends interested in the sustainability of umc:
                                                     i am pleased to share with you the results of umc’s corporate social responsibility efforts. although 2014 was a slow year in terms of
 from the ceo                                        the global economy, our company persisted in our efforts, continued to make breakthroughs in technology, productivity and customer
                                                     development, and saw steady quarterly growth in overall revenue. in addition, umc has strived to promote a sustainable business,
 principles for report compilation                   and this report discloses our sustainable management efforts for the previous year according to the latest global sustainability
                                                     reporting guidelines (gri g4).
 major umc outcomes and                              umc upholds the philosophy of providing our customers with the most competitive foundry solutions. we not only invest in high-end
 sustainability performance                          manufacturing process technology research and development in taiwan to strengthen our competitiveness, but with due consideration
                                                     to balancing risk and cost, we have respectively announced our investment in and alliance with fujitsu semiconductor in japan. we
 about umc                                           have also acquired shares in a 300mm fab joint venture in xiamen, china to meet customer needs and increase shareholder value.
                                                     we have also continued to optimize customer service, and in 2014, became the first foundry company in taiwan to obtain iso 15408
                                                     certification. thus, in addition to providing customers with stringent manufacturing, we have helped customers save product
 sustainable development strategy                    certification time and accelerated product launch into the market, thereby furthering our market development for security ic products.
 and organization
                                                     the 2014, umc sustainable committee is further divided into sub-committees for green manufacturing, green technology and
                                                     customer service. a sustainable office is also instituted to enhance sustainability and core competitiveness, thereby strengthening
1 communication with stakeholders                    coordination. in terms of corporate governance, the remuneration committee, audit committee and capital budget committee
                                                     remain committed to improving efficiency and sound oversight functions. the positive interaction and balances between the board of
2 sustainable development-                           directors and management teams not only improve operational transparency, but also protect shareholder equities, and our a++
  economic growth                                    standing with the securities and futures institute for information disclosure is the result of our adherence to integrity and honesty.
                                                     in terms of environmental sustainability, we were not only ahead in fulfilling the 369+ resource reduction plan in 2014, but were also
3 sustainable development-                           the first domestic company to be reviewed and approved for carbon trading rights by the environmental protection agency. profits
  environment                                        from the trading were invested into establishing an environmental foundation for the eco conservation hope project. in addition to 12
                                                     consecutive years of winning the roc enterprises environmental protection award, we were once again affirmed with the highest
                                                     score among taiwan's semiconductor industry in the international carbon disclosure project. in our social involvement, umc has 6
4 sustainable development-society
                                                     core plans committed to creating a safe working environment, protecting employee health and work-life balance, and upholding umc’s
                                                     distinguished tradition of volunteer community service so that from disadvantaged rural areas to
 appendix
                                                     ecological wilderness, outreach is expanded and seeds of hope sown to promote a positive cycle of corporate influence and social
                                                     goodwill.
                                                     overall, sustainable development is not only umc’s vision but is also the core philosophy and competitiveness of our operation and         ceo and cs committee chairman
                                                     development. in 2014, umc was listed as a constituent stock in the dow jones sustainable index (djsi) for the 7th consecutive year.
                                                     in the asia sustainable business award organized by singapore’s channel news asia, we ranked top in taiwan and 4th in asia.
                                                     moreover, we were among the top ten in the 1st taiwan corporate sustainability awards (tcsa), and also won other awards such as
                                                     the commonwealth magazine corporate citizenship award, thereby confirming the domestic and international recognition of our
                                                     sustainability performance.
                                                     looking to the future, umc is committed to the most rigorous self-expectation and will strive to initiate actions to enhance sustainable
                                                     competitiveness. the green 2020 goals, employee care, social outreach and volunteer services remain the direction of our continuing
                                     from the ceo
                                                     efforts. we welcome the feedback and suggestions from all fields so that we can become increasingly robust in the implementation of
                                                     our corporate social responsibility and sustainable management.

                                                 about umc

                                                  introduction                                                        establish in taiwan, distribute worldwide
                                                  united microelectronics (umc short) is a world-class foundry        umc plays an important role in taiwan’s semiconductor industry. in addition to being taiwan's first wafer fabrication company, it is also
 from the ceo                                     company that provides advanced process and foundry services         taiwan's first listed semiconductor corporation. to meet the needs of customers worldwide, umc has established service locations in
                                                  to produce ic wafers for major application products. umc offers     taiwan, japan, china, singapore, south korea, europe and the united states. umc will continue to strive to provide its customers
 principles for report compilation                comprehensive solutions that give ic design companies an            with the world's leading process and a full range of professional foundry solutions so that they may continue to build a competitive
                                                  edge in advanced processes and a wide range of special              advantage in today's rapidly changing industry.
 major umc outcomes and                           technologies, helping customers differentiate their products in
 sustainability performance                       the competitive ic market

 and organization                                     to ensure a safe working environment and the basic labor rights of supply chain enterprises in the global electronics industry, umc established the eicc committee in 2013 to address issues pertaining to
                                                      labor, health and safety, environment, ethics and management systems. the eicc committee defines the tasks, authority and responsibilities of its members, develops relevant policies and performance

                                                     4-3-3 umc fire brigade                                                                                                                                     professional skill training
                                                     in view of the gases, diverse and complex chemicals, and large confined dust-free spaces in semiconductor fabs, fire-fighting and
 from the ceo
                                                     disaster rescue are different from traditional methods and considerably more risky. on april 1999, umc established a high technology
                                                     fire brigade under the management of the risk management and environmental safety department. it is the only fire brigade belonging
 principles for report compilation                   to a corporation in the taiwan’s domestic electronics industry.
                                                     members of the fire brigade rotate every two years, the april 2013-april 2015 team is the 8th brigade, and comprises of 14 full-time
 major umc outcomes and                              members and 106 members from the task group. most members have a master's degree, and it is the highest quality fire brigade in the                      emergency response training              fire training for all employees
 sustainability performance                          nation. each new member must receive professional training in disaster rescue, including professional simulated training in fire rescue.

                                                     4-4-2 promote umc volunteer culture

 from the ceo                                        volunteer services
                                                     when umc was established, it embraced the philosophy that “as a social institution, a corporation must strive to reciprocate to
 principles for report compilation                   society” in its long term business approach. hence umc cultivates "satisfied employees who are not only committed to the growth of
                                                     umc, but who are eager to participate in community service.” to encourage employees to engage in public service, umｃ provides
 major umc outcomes and                              employee leave for volunteer services, and under the leadership of the umc science and culture foundation, the volunteer culture
 sustainability performance                          has gradually expanded to include other employees in addition to those from the foundation.
                                                     currently, umc has a large team of happy volunteers who initiate community service groups such as the candlelight club,
 about umc                                           mountaineering club and ukelele club that eagerly participate in serving the community. the total hours of employee volunteer time
                                                     has been increasing each year, and in 2014, the various clubs contributed 210 service sessions to disadvantaged populations.

                                     assurance statement

 from the ceo

 principles for report compilation                                                       assurance statement                                                        verification/ assurance opinion
                                                                                                                                                                    on the basis of the methodology described and the verification work performed, we are satisfied that the information
                                                                                                                                                                    and data contained within umc’s csr report of 2014 verified is accurate, reliable and provides a fair and balanced
 major umc outcomes and                                                                                                                                             representation of umc sustainability activities in 01/01/2014 to 12/31/2014.
                                          sgs taiwan ltd.’s independent assurance report on                                                                         the assurance team is of the opinion that the report can be used by the reporting organization’s stakeholders.
 sustainability performance               sustainability activities in the united microelectronics                                                                  we believe that the organization has chosen an appropriate level of assurance for this stage in their reporting. the
                                          corporation’s corporate social responsible report of 2014                                                                 report is the seventh to be assured by an independent assurance team and umc has taken a bold step by offering
                                                                                                                                                                    the report to evaluation against both gri g4 guidelines and the aa1000 assurance standard. this shows a

 about umc                                                                                                                                                          deserved confidence in their reporting process.
                                                                                                                                                                    in our opinion, the contents of the report meet the requirements of gri g4 comprehensive option and aa1000
                                          nature and scope of the assurance/verification                                                                            assurance standard (2008) type 2, high level assurance.

                                          sgs taiwan ltd. (hereinafter referred to as sgs) was commissioned by united microelectronics
 sustainable development strategy

                                          corporation (hereinafter referred to as umc) to conduct an independent assurance of the corporate social                  inclusivity
                                          responsible report (hereinafter referred to as csr report) of 2014. the scope of the assurance, based on the              umc is committed to being accountable to its stakeholders and to integrating inclusivity into its strategic and
 and organization                         sgs sustainability report assurance methodology, included the text, and data in accompanying tables contained in          management approach. a variety of engagement efforts such as survey and communication to employees,
                                          this report.                                                                                                              customers, investors, local communities, suppliers and other stakeholders are implemented to underpin the
                                                                                                                                                                    organization's understanding of stakeholder concerns. for future reporting, umc may proactively consider having
